series_title: Ended Cases: Felonies These records document the defense of felony charges when the person charged is represented by an attorney from one of the Commission's Public Defender Offices. This series summons, warrants, briefs, indictments, charges, statements, notes, reports and other pertinent case material.

Ended Cases: Felonies Less Serious These records document the defense of less serious felony charges when the person charged is represented by an from one of the Commission's Public Defender Offices. This series includes summons, warrants, briefs, indictments, charges, statements, notes, reports and other pertinent case material.

series_description: This series documents the defense of misdemeanor charges when the person charged is represented by an attorney from one of the Commission's Public Defender Offices. This series may include, but is not limited to: briefs, warrants, summons, statements, notes, and reports.
